txt.en: TBD - Speak to NAME in Ost Andir
Retrieve the key to Igerna's cage
Igerna has asked you to find the key to her cage. She suggests the overseers may be the ones to carry the keys.\n\nGoblin overseers can be found throughout the cave and in Krauzhaf, in Pinnath Gelin.
'If I could, I would hug you, but the door to my cage is locked tight. I have only seen it unlocked with keys the overseers have. Hunt them down until you find the key.'
Igerna has been found alive, but injured and captive. Her freedom must be gained, but the door to her rusted metal cage sits firmly locked.

After battling through the halls of Krauzhaf, you recovered an iron key that looks like it will fit the lock on Igerna's cage door.\n\nYou should unlock Igerna's cage, in the cave at Krauzhaf, in Pinnath Gelin.
'If I could, I would hug you, but the door to my cage is locked tight.
'Freedom! Thank you, my new friend. I have been trapped in there for days.'
'Freedom! Thank you, my new friend. I have been trapped in there for days.'
